item.title: Chemfab Alkalis Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: Chemfab Alkalis has reached a new 52-week low, closing near Rs 435.05, marking a significant milestone in its ongoing price decline. The stock’s recent performance reflects a challenging period for the company within the commodity chemicals sector, as it trades well below key moving averages and continues to lag behind broader market indices. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Trade Flat Amid Mixed Sector Performance; Jupiter Wagons and Coforge Lead Market Moves
item.description: The Indian equity markets exhibited a subdued session on 23 December 2025, with the Sensex and Nifty indices trading largely flat amid a mixed performance across sectors. While select large caps and small caps showed notable movements, overall market breadth remained modestly positive as investors weighed global cues and domestic factors. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Sundrop Brands Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.685 Amid Market Pressure

item.title: Cupid Stock Surges Over 400% in Six Months, Outperforming Market Benchmarks
item.description: Cupid has delivered an extraordinary return of 413.9% over the past six months, significantly outpacing broader market indices and emerging as a standout performer among small-cap stocks in the FMCG sector. This remarkable surge reflects a combination of bullish technical signals and very positive financial indicators, despite the stock’s valuation remaining on the expensive side. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: SMT Engineering Delivers Exceptional 1810% Return, Outshining Market Benchmarks
